rules.text: Respect the laws of the Netherlands and the Isle of Man, including those related to hate speech and defamation.

Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behavior may lead to moderation and/or further measures. We have a zero tolerance approach to racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia. Moderation decisions are final.
The Content Warning flag should be used for NSFW content, and NSFW media should be marked as sensitive.

Account registrations are monitored and accounts considered spam (including commercial advertising, political campaigning/propaganda, duplicate accounts or impersonating legal entities) will be moderated or removed.
Do not harass or bully other users.
Do not share illegal or copyrighted content.
Do not spam or engage in any form of malicious activity.
Keep discussions civil and respectful, and refrain from using derogatory language or engaging in personal attacks.
Do not reveal personal information about other people without their consent.
Use appropriate tags and content warnings when posting potentially sensitive or triggering content.
If you see a violation of these rules, report it to the moderation team.
To use our service, you are at least 18 years old.
